author: craigmcc
msg: Fix the "jasper.sh" update checked in yesterday:
* Do not use an uninitialized CP variable the first time through
* Add double quotes as needed in case paths have spaces in them
* Add all of the repositories that will be visible at runtime
(classes, jasper/*.jar, lib/*.jar, common/classes, common/lib/*.jar)
* Build the class path in an order to simulate the class loading
hierarchy that will be visible at runtime.

author: glenn
msg: Add org.apache.catalina.util.URL to classes preloaded

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove a width="100%" setting from the <table> generated for attributes lists,
to see if that helps avoid problems where the right side of the documentation
pages are cut off for some users.

author: craigmcc
msg: Japanese translations for all of the Catalina and Jasper message
resources.
(I'm embarrassed to say that I don't know how to say "thank you" in
Japanese, even translating phonetically to ASCII, but thank you all the
same ;-)
Submitted by:	Kazuhiro Kazama <kazama@ingrid.org>
